item.title: BlogT
item.description: 自个学习搭建Hugo和挂载到Github上去 hugo new site myblog cd myblog/ cd themes git submodule add https://github.com/UtkarshVerma/hugo-dream-plus dream-plus git submodule update –init –recursive hugo server -t dream-plus –buildDrafts cd myblog/ hugo new post/blog.md hugo server -t dream-plus –buildDrafts hugo –theme=dream-plus –baseUrl="https://horizono.github.io/” –buildDrafts cd public/ cd myblog cd public/ git init git add . git commit -m “this is my time” git remote add origin https://github.com/HorizonO/horizono.github.io.git git push -u origin master
